text:
Hello,
I have run into an issue with email modules and setting variables. I have an email that uses a "control" module, where you make some selections and it set various hubl variables that affect other modules. This email continues to work, however cloning the email or trying to make a new one with the modules no longer works. I tried to simplify it to just the vary basic "set variable : get variable", and it seems there has been some update that breaks this, it will no longer find variables set in other modules.
